description: Hagoromo Otsutsuki, also known to the world at large as the Rikudou Sennin (Sage of Six Paths) was the legendary figure who founded Ninshuu, which led to the creation of the ninja world. Together with his fraternal twin brother, Hamura, he defeated the Ten-Tailed Beast and sealed it within his own body, thus becoming the first jinchuuriki.
name: Ootsutsuki Hagoromo
